analysis.key_quote: This proposed reversion to corrupt and politically driven system will make the government enterprise far LESS PERFORMATIVE, LESS ACCOUNTABLE and LESS RESPONSIVE UNLESS YOU ARE "CONNECTED" (to the current administration).
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about reverting to a politically driven system, which undermines the merit-based civil service. It emphasizes the risks of corruption and politicization, aligning with the indicators for opposition.
